```csharp
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace TodoList.Blazor
{
    public class TodoItem
    {
        public int Id { get; set; }
        public string Title { get; set; }
        public bool IsCompleted { get; set; }
    }
}

=== START FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Services/TodoItemService.cs
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace TodoList.Blazor.Services
{
    public class TodoItemService
    {
        private List<TodoItem> _todoItems;

        public TodoItemService()
        {
            _todoItems = new List<TodoItem>
            {
                new TodoItem { Id = 1, Title = "Complete homework", IsCompleted = false },
                new TodoItem { Id = 2, Title = "Go for a run", IsCompleted = true },
                new TodoItem { Id = 3, Title = "Buy groceries", IsCompleted = false }
            };
        }

        public List<TodoItem> GetTodoItems()
        {
            return _todoItems;
        }
    }
}
=== END FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Services/TodoItemService.cs

=== START FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Pages/Index.razor
@page "/"

@using TodoList.Blazor.Services
@inject TodoItemService todoItemService

<h3>Todo List</h3>

<ul>
    @foreach (var todo in todoItemService.GetTodoItems())
    {
        <li>@todo.Title</li>
    }
</ul>
=== END FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Pages/Index.razor

=== START FILE: TodoList.Blazor/StartupRegistration.cs
using Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection;

namespace TodoList.Blazor
{
    public class StartupRegistration : IStartupRegistration
    {
        public void RegisterServices(IServiceCollection services)
        {
            services.AddSingleton<TodoItemService>();
        }
    }
}
=== END FILE: TodoList.Blazor/StartupRegistration.cs
```
